item.title: Azure Storage
item.description: Microsoft’s cloud storage solution for modern data storage scenarios Offers following services: Azure Blobs: Massively scalable, object store for text and binary files. Azure Files: File share for on-premise and cloud. Azure Queues: Reliable messaging store for applications. Azure Tables: NoSQL store for schemaless data storage. Azure Disks: Block Level volumes for Azure VMs. Each service is accessed through a Storage Account Provides following benefits: Durable and Highly available Secure Scalable Managed Accessible Storage Account Contains all azure storage data objects.
